name: Affection (Cheezeh3d, Hap3guy)
description:
“A single act of kindness throws out roots in all directions, and the roots spring up and make new trees.” – Amelia Earhart 

 In this game, you are a stranger with a glowing personality due to the positive roots that guide you on your journey. As you are walking along, you stumble upon a small village. However, this village is littered with negative aura. This aura is being produced by the residents of this village, who are all experiencing negative emotions. This negative aura is effecting and hurting the environment in this village. You take it upon yourself to visit each home and help these villagers get through these tough times. By throwing your positive roots out in the direction of this town, you hope that something might change... In this game, you will walk around the town, visit each home, and help those in need. By doing so, your positive roots will grow in all directions, which produces trees that will help make everyone's lives a little bit better. Move with WASD or arrow keys, jump with SPACE. Complete objectives to beat the game.
